Name: Fire All Humans
About the game: Fire All Humans is a physics based puzzle game in which you need to fire humans through elaborate levels, open doors, splat the other humans and jump your way through to get to the Doomsday Source! Using the mouse to adjust the velocity, send humans flying and use strategy and teamwork (Yes, they look like paperdollies or weird gingerbread men - No humans were hurt in the development of this game) get through all 24 levels and master this challenging and addictive game. We also expect some laughs along the way!
